question: Which organisation is to provide Data to the Government for identifying targeted beneficiaries for Covid-19 vaccination?
explanation:
The Election Commission is to provide Data to the government for identifying targeted beneficiaries for Covid-19 vaccination.
The Election Commission however urged the health authorities to delete the data once the vaccination process is over, as per media reports. In December 2020, Home Secretary wrote to CEC in identifying people above 50 years of age.
